long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Colorful QR Code Generator lets you create customized QR codes for any link using your own colors. Whether you're looking to link to a website, YouTube channel, social media profile, wedding invitation, or any other site, our extension makes it easy to create QR codes.

Features:
Color Customization: Personalize your QR codes by selecting custom colors for the foreground and background, ensuring your QR code matches your brand or theme.
Dark Mode: Colorful QR Code Generator automatically uses dark mode if your browser is set to dark mode.
Easy Link Entry: Just enter the URL you want your QR code to point to, customize the colors, and download your unique QR code instantly.
Download with One Click: Perfect for websites, printed materials, broadcasts, streams, invitations, and more. By quickly downloading your QR code, you can use the QR code however you'd like: include it in digital content, or use it for event invitations like RSVPs.
No Extra Permissions Required: Create custom QR codes without any additional permissions or sign-up.

How It Works:
1. Enter Your Link. Use the textbox to input the URL you want the QR code to link to, whether it’s a website, social media page, or video.
2. Customize Your QR Code. Choose your preferred colors for the QR code background and foreground using the color selectors.
3. Download and Use. Click the download button to get your custom QR code. You can then use it anywhere - print it, share it digitally, or include it in invitations and promotional materials.

What is a QR Code?
A QR code is a type of barcode that can be scanned by smartphones, making it easy to share links. Businesses and individuals use QR codes to link to websites, videos, social media pages, and apps.
